docs.title: engine.lua
docs.text:
The script that returns when you require lovexyz. Used to handle the main drawing, transforming, and shading processes.

All meshes are rendered from triangles.lua.

docs.title: Parameters
docs.text: The modifiable parameters for engine.lua

docs.title: engine.canvas
docs.text: The main canvas when drawing to the window.

docs.title: engine.depthCanvas
docs.text: The depth buffer of the main canvas.

docs.title: engine.graphicsScale
docs.text: The main canvas resolution multiplier based on screen resolution.

docs.title: engine.lighting
docs.text: A container consisting of lighting parameters to be used by the renderer.

docs.title: engine.lighting.solidSkyColor
docs.text: The default sky color if skybox is not rendered.

docs.title: engine.lighting.sunDirection
docs.text: The sun direction. note: sun direction will be normalized in the shader note: direction is pointing from world origin to sun direction

docs.title: engine.lighting.ambient
docs.text: The ambient value to be used in engine.transformShader .

docs.title: engine.lighting.specShininess
docs.text: The specular exponent to be used in engine.transformShader .

docs.title: engine.lighting.specStrength
docs.text: The specular strength to be used in engine.transformShader .

docs.title: engine.lighting.shadowEnabled
docs.text: Boolean to check for shadows, updating engine.shadowMap, and used in engine.transformShader .

docs.title: engine.lighting.specularEnabled
docs.text: Boolean to check for speculars to be used in engine.transformShader .

docs.title: engine.lighting.diffuseEnabled
docs.text: Boolean to check for diffuse to be used in engine.transformShader .

docs.title: engine.lighting.skyboxEnabled
docs.text: Boolean to draw the skybox.

docs.title: engine.cam
docs.text: A container consisting of camera information.

docs.title: engine.cam.pos
docs.text: A vec3 of the camera position in world space.

docs.title: engine.cam.rot
docs.text: A vec3 of the camera rotation in euler angles.

docs.title: engine.cam.fov
docs.text: Field of view of the camera in radians.

docs.title: engine.cam.matrix
docs.text: Camera offset matrix. note: real camera matrix is handled internally

docs.title: engine.skyboxShader
docs.text: The skybox shader used when rendering to the main canvas if engine.lighting.skyboxEnabled is true.

docs.title: engine.transformShader
docs.text: The main shader used when rendering to the main canvas, handles projection and lighting based on engine.lighting params.

docs.title: engine.transformOnly
docs.text: Shader used for custom depth canvases.

docs.title: engine.proj
docs.text: Perspective projection of the main camera.

docs.title: engine.skyboxFormat
docs.text: Vertex format of the skybox.

docs.title: engine.skyboxMesh
docs.text: Mesh of the skybox.

docs.title: engine.skyTexture
docs.text: The texture of the skybox. note: call engine.skyboxMesh:setTexture(engine.skyTexture) everytime you make changes to the sky texture

docs.title: engine.shadowMap
docs.text: A canvas containing orthographic depth information from the sun's view.

docs.title: engine.shadowSize
docs.text: A number to be used by engine.sunProj.

docs.title: engine.sunProj
docs.text: Orthographic projection matrix of the sun.

docs.title: engine.draw()
docs.text: Handles and draws everything needed for the rendering.

docs.title: engine.refreshCanvases()
docs.text: Refresh canvases that are altered by resolution.

docs.title: obj.lua
docs.text:
The script that handles obj model loading. Used in triangles.lua to get mesh vertexes.

Default global: obj

docs.title: obj.loadVerts(path : string)
docs.text: Parses necessary obj file information into mesh vertexes.

docs.title: triangles.lua
docs.text:
The script that is used to parse and store model meshes. Uses obj.lua to parse obj files and convert them to mesh data

Default global: triangles

docs.title: triangles.meshes
docs.text: Stores loaded meshes.

docs.title: triangles.loadedModels
docs.text: Stores loaded models.

docs.title: triangles.textureCache
docs.text: Stores cached textures.

docs.title: triangles.textureCache
docs.text: Stores cached textures.
